fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Send your target a picture of Astfolo. If they do not respond with anything signifying that Astolfo is cute, they are attacked
-Send your target a picture of Felix. If they do not respond with words of disgust, they are Modkilled.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -The first time you would be killed, you are not.
